0871A46B.Toast: Insatiable greed leads to ill-fated deed.

1EADAE68.Callback2Header: Search for Tuji in the Ruins of Qara-Yisu

61CFD437.Phase11Description:
I've retrieved Tuji's body from Qara Yisu. It seems he and the thief, Gan, were victims of the demonic corruption that turned the city to salt. 

I should return Tuji's body to Jargal.

D53BFF05.Phase0Description:
Jargal says a jealous merchant stole his beloved goat, Tuji. The merchant was heading towards Qara Yisu.

I should see if I can find the thief and Tuji among the ruins.
